パッケージ io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar

クラス FlagWar

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
io.github.townyadvanced.flagwar.FlagWar
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
public class FlagWar extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
The main class of the TownyAdvanced: FlagWar addon. Houses core functionality.

    • registerAttack

      public static void registerAttack(CellUnderAttack cell) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Function to register an attack to a player (by running through addFlagToPlayerCount(String, CellUnderAttack)), add it to the ATTACK_HASH_MAP, and run CellUnderAttack.beginAttack().
      パラメータ:
      cell - CellUnderAttack to process.
      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if the Player's active flags would become greater than the Maximum per Player.
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if the attackCell is already registered in the ATTACK_HASH_MAP.

    • removeAttackerFlags

      public static void removeAttackerFlags(String playerName)
      Cancel all active attacks started by a given player.
      パラメータ:
      playerName - name of a Player, used as key when looking up CellUnderAttack to cancel.

    • checkBlock

      public static void checkBlock(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.block.Block block, org.bukkit.event.Cancellable event)
      Evaluate a Block to register a successful defense and/or cancel a Cancellable event.

      If a Block is in the FlagWarConfig.isAffectedMaterial(Material) list and the Block's Cell is under attack, evaluate if the Block is the flagTimerBlock, and if so: call attackDefended(Player, CellUnderAttack) amd cancel the event. If it is not the flagTimerBlock, but does match with CellUnderAttack.isImmutableBlock(Block): cancel the event.

      パラメータ:
      player - player to be registered as the attack defender.
      block - Block to evaluate
      event - an event being evaluated for cancellation.

    • callAttackCellEvent

      public static boolean callAttackCellEvent(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.Towny towny, org.bukkit.entity.Player player, org.bukkit.block.Block block, com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.WorldCoord worldCoord) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Qualifies an action as a successful attack, charges any fees (if economy enabled), then kick-starts the CellAttackEvent and sets up associated variables.
      パラメータ:
      towny - Towny Instance.
      player - The would-be attacker.
      block - The block that would form the flagBaseBlock.
      worldCoord - The WorldCoord of the block, or where the attack is taking place.
      戻り値:
      True if the attack was successful and after everything
      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - If the attack would be invalid. Not all returns are thrown exceptions.

    • checkIfTownHasMinOnlineForWar

      public static void checkIfTownHasMinOnlineForWar(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town town) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Check if a Town meets the minimum requirement of Players online to participate in a flag war.
      パラメータ:
      town - Town to check for eligibility.
      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if there are not enough online players.

    • checkIfAttackingTownHasMinOnlineForWar

      public static void checkIfAttackingTownHasMinOnlineForWar(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town town) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Check if a Town meets the minimum requirement of Players online to attack in a flag war.
      パラメータ:
      town - Town to check for eligibility.
      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if there are not enough online players.

    • checkIfNationHasMinOnlineForWar

      public static void checkIfNationHasMinOnlineForWar(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Nation nation) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Check if a Nation meets the minimum requirement of Players online to participate in a flag war.
      パラメータ:
      nation - Nation to check for eligibility.
      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if there are not enough online players.

    • checkIfAttackingNationHasMinOnlineForWar

      public static void checkIfAttackingNationHasMinOnlineForWar(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Nation nation) throws com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException
      Check if a Nation meets the minimum requirement of Players online to attack in a flag war.
      パラメータ:

      例外:
      com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.exceptions.TownyException - if there are not enough online players.

    • cellToWorldCoordinate

      public static com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.WorldCoord cellToWorldCoordinate(Cell cell)
      Convert a Cell to it's appropriate WorldCoord.
      パラメータ:
      cell - supplied for conversion.
      戻り値:
      a WorldCoord with the Cell's associated world name, x value, and z value.

    • townFlagged

      public static void townFlagged(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town town)
      Update a Town's entry in the TOWN_LAST_FLAGGED_HASH_MAP.
      パラメータ:
